citeinfo.title: Minnesota Ruffed Grouse Drumming Count Routes and Stops

pubinfo.publish: Minnesota DNR - Division of Fish & Wildlife - Wildlife Unit

descript.abstract:
This resource contains points for census stops and lines for census routes on the Ruffed Grouse Drumming Count Survey.
Each route typically includes 10 stops, numbered sequentially 1-10. This coverage is not complete, and will be updated as missing data are obtained.
descript.purpose: This layer was created to help resource managers maintain positional consistency in the annual drumming count census, and to enable Wildlife Research to conduct habitat/population correlation analyses based upon census points.

cntperp.cntorg: Minnesota DNR - Division of Fish & Wildlife - Wildlife Unit

dataqual.logic: Data are topologically correct using ARCView 3.x
dataqual.complete: This is not yet a complete coverage of all stops and routes on the annual drumming count census.

horizpa.horizpar:
Source layer obs_rgdcspt3: Points were recorded on sportsman-grade (Garmin76 or equivalent) units, and are not corrected.
Source layer obs_rgdcrln3: Most routes are derived from DOT roads files, or other transportation layers. The remainder were collected using Garmin76-grade gps units and/or digitized on-screen from 2008 air photos.

spdoinfo.indspref: Census points for Ruffed Grouse Drumming Counts

distinfo.distliab: The Minnesota Department of Natural Resources General Geographic Data License Agreement is online: http://www.dnr.state.mn.us/sitetools/data_software_license.html
